statements: SELECT * FROM discussion_threads;
SELECT id, title, author FROM discussion_threads;
SELECT title, author, created_at FROM discussion_threads WHERE author = 'Alice';
SELECT id, content FROM discussion_threads WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM discussion_threads ORDER BY created_at DESC, author ASC;
SELECT * FROM discussion_threads WHERE author = 'Alice' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, title FROM discussion_threads WHERE content LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS num_threads FROM discussion_threads GROUP BY author ORDER BY num_threads DESC;
SELECT title, author, created_at FROM discussion_threads WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at;
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(content)) AS avg_content_length FROM discussion_threads;
SELECT * FROM discussion_threads;
SELECT title, content FROM discussion_threads WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, content FROM discussion_threads WHERE created_at > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM updates;
SELECT update_content, created_at FROM updates WHERE thread_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM discussion_threads WHERE id = 1
SELECT title FROM discussion_threads WHERE id = 2
SELECT title, content FROM discussion_threads WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM updates WHERE thread_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, update_content FROM updates WHERE thread_id = 2
SELECT * FROM threads ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT topic, created_at FROM threads WHERE thread_id = 1
SELECT message_text, author FROM messages WHERE thread_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT topic, created_at FROM threads WHERE topic LIKE 'Tech%'
SELECT update_text, updated_by FROM updates ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT * FROM threads WHERE thread_id = 1;
SELECT topic, created_at FROM threads WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT thread_id, COUNT(message_id) AS message_count FROM messages GROUP BY thread_id HAVING COUNT(message_id) > 10 ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT t.thread_id, t.topic, u.update_text FROM threads t JOIN updates u ON t.thread_id = u.thread_id WHERE u.updated_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY u.updated_at DESC;

SELECT m.thread_id, m.author, COUNT(u.update_id) AS update_count FROM messages m LEFT JOIN updates u ON m.thread_id = u.thread_id GROUP BY m.thread_id, m.author HAVING update_count > 5 ORDER BY update_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM discussion_threads;
SELECT title, author FROM discussion_threads WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM discussion_updates ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT id, role_name FROM team_roles WHERE id > 2;
SELECT id, title, author FROM discussion_threads WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM discussion_updates ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT id, role_name, description FROM team_roles WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY role_name;
SELECT * FROM discussion_threads WHERE author LIKE '%John%' AND created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM threads;
SELECT thread_id, thread_title FROM threads ORDER BY thread_id DESC;
SELECT thread_id, thread_title, created_at FROM threads WHERE thread_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE thread_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM threads ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT thread_title, created_at FROM threads WHERE thread_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, teams.team_name FROM users INNER JOIN team_members ON users.user_id = team_members.user_id INNER JOIN teams ON team_members.team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT thread_title, message_text FROM threads JOIN messages ON threads.thread_id = messages.thread_id WHERE messages.created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT users.username, team_name FROM users, teams, team_members WHERE users.user_id = team_members.user_id AND teams.team_id = team_members.team_id ORDER BY users.username ASC;
